doc.field: CAMBRIDGE SELLS 100 MLN DLRS OF DEBENTURES

Cambridge Shopping Centres Ltd> said wholly owned Cambridge Leaseholds Ltd privately sold 100 mln dlrs of secured debentures. It said the debentures were issued in three parts consisting of a 20 mln dlr issue at 10.4 pct maturing March 31, 1997, 22 mln dlrs at 10.6 pct maturing March 31, 2002 and 58 mln dlrs at 10.7 pct maturing March 31, 2007. Cambridge said it would use proceeds to significantly reduce short-term debt. Reuter
